name: victory-pie
description: D3 pie & donut chart component for React
author: Angela Nicholas

scripts.postinstall: cd lib || builder run npm:postinstall || (echo 'POSTINSTALL FAILED: If using npm v2, please upgrade to npm v3. See bug https://github.com/FormidableLabs/builder/issues/35' && exit 1)
scripts.version: builder run npm:version && git add dist && git commit -m "Commit 'dist/' for publishing"
scripts.docs-build-static: echo 'Static docs generation for victory-pie is not supported
